channel.title: Nhial Wei — Journal
channel.description: Journaling, personal insights, and career guidance.

item.title: The Quiet Advantage: Consistency Beats Intensity
item.description: The people who grow fastest aren’t the ones who move the most—they’re the ones who return every day with clarity.

item.title: Clear Writing Is Career Leverage
item.description: If you can explain complex ideas clearly, you create trust. Trust creates opportunities.

item.title: Learning Notes That Compound
item.description: Turn reading and experience into a personal knowledge base you can reuse.
